solution_line_template: When Tim has {tim_photos} photos, then Paul has {tim_photos} + {paul_more_than_tim} photos = <<{tim_photos}+{paul_more_than_tim}={paul_photos}>>{paul_photos} photos.
Tim and Paul have together {tim_photos} photos + {paul_photos} photos = <<{tim_photos}+{paul_photos}={tim_and_paul_total}>>{tim_and_paul_total} photos.
That leaves Tom with {total_photos} photos - {tim_and_paul_total} photos = <<{total_photos}-{tim_and_paul_total}={tom_photos}>>{tom_photos} photos.
